data.text: @dgalvin_au Hi David, we're so sorry for the delays and inconvenience that this has caused you. We do our best to avoid delays – but sometimes things are out of our hands. Hopefully you’ll be on your way soon. – Paul
@dr_strangelo Hi there, sorry to hear you're having trouble reaching our Holidays Team. Feel free to send us a DM should you require assistance with your booking. Thanks - Leslie

@proseccobubbly Hi Prosecco, I understand how inconvenient it is to have missing baggage. Our baggage team are best placed to assist you with this and can be reached here - https://t.co/6zamkVdTPZ. Thanks – Jay

data.text: @sezpalmerr Hi Sarah, sorry to hear that your flight has been cancelled and I understand how having your flight cancelled can affect your travel plans. Would you mind sending us a DM? We’d appreciate the chance to look into this further for you. Thanks - Vi
@sarah_m_turner Hi Sarah, I understand how upsetting it can be when travel plans change. We’d appreciate the chance to look into this further. Could you please send us a DM here? Thanks - Norine

@Tronthepom Hi there, sorry to hear your flight got cancelled. We never like having to cancel our flights. However, sometimes things are out of our hands. If you still need assistance with your flight, feel free to DM us here so we can assist. Thanks - Norine
@aomgxgot7 Hi there, we're sorry for any inconvenience caused. We do our best to avoid delays – but sometimes things are out of our hands. Hopefully you’ll be on your way soon. – Leslie
@jain_keshav Hi Keshav, sorry to hear about this. Should you require any further assistance, feel free to send us a DM to speak with an agent. Thanks - Vi
@AnnaHocking I understand how upsetting it can be when travel plans change so if you still need assistance with your booking, feel free to send us a DM here so we can assist. Thanks - Norine 2/2
@AnnaHocking Hi Anna, I'm sorry to hear your flight got cancelled and you're having a hard time reaching our team for recovery options. 1/1

@stevendoyle Hi Steven, I understand how having your flight cancelled can affect your travel plans. Feel free to send us a DM if you require assistance with rebooking your flight or would like to explore alternative options. Thanks - Leslie

@keeper74 Hi Frank, we never like having to cancel a flight however sometimes it’s unavoidable. Would you mind sending a DM with your booking details? We'd appreciate the chance to look into this for you. Thanks - Jay
@Jodie3735 Hi Jodie, sorry to hear this. Would you mind sending us a DM with your booking reference number? We'd like to look into this further. Thanks - Jeff

@adamsaunders111 Hi Adam, sorry to hear this. We know how inconvenient cancelled flights can be and we try to avoid them as much as possible. Would you mind sending us a DM with more info? We'd like to see what we can do. Thanks - Jeff

@phelan_margaret Hi Margo, sorry to hear this. I understand how having flight cancellations can affect travel plans. Would you mind sending us a DM with more info? We'd like to see what we can do. Thanks - Jeff

@GordonlKnight Hi Gordon, We're very sorry about your experience during your recent journey back from Japan.  I can see that your case is still active, and the Case Manager will come back to you directly shortly. Thanks - Kimmy
@FelixEldridge Hi Felix, thanks for reaching out. Would you be able to DM us to speak with an agent? We’d appreciate the chance to look into this further. - Jen
@Klaus54361640 @Klaus54361640 Hi Klaus, I see how upsetting this situation is for you. So that we can look into this further, can I have your full name on the booking, please? Thanks - Paul

@Klaus54361640 I understand you'd like to know the reason for your cancellation and delay, Klaus. Would you mind sending us a DM here? We'd appreciate the chance to look into this further. Thanks - Norine

@Klaus54361640 Hi Klaus, I understand how upsetting it can be when travel plans change. We do our best to avoid delays but sometimes things are out of our hands. Hopefully, you’ll be on your way soon. Feel free to send us a DM here if you need assistance with your flights. Thanks - Norine
@Angie88403684 Hi Angie, thanks for your reply. Would you be able to send us a DM so we can look into this further for you? Thanks - Vi

@queerandjaded Hi Jade, sorry to hear this. We never like having to cancel a flight however sometimes it’s unavoidable. If you require assistance with a specific booking, you may DM with your booking details so we can assist. - Jay

@travellingred77 Hi David, we’re sorry this was your experience onboard. That’s not the standard we set for our aircraft- thanks for letting us know. We’ve passed this onto our cleaners. Thanks – Kimmy
@t0pix Hi Taupik, I understand that you need assistance with correcting your name. Would you mind sending us a DM with more info? We'd be happy to assist you. Thanks - Jeff
@Cmdr_Pants @Cmdr_Pants Hi there, would you mind sending us a DM with more info? We’d appreciate the chance to look into this and see what we can do. Thanks - Paul
@malissahossain Hi Malissa, I appreciate that you'd like to know your flight status. Would you mind sending us a DM so we can look into this further for you? Thanks - Vi
@0xMelb Hi @0xMelb, I understand your concern about the email you have received. We’d like to look into this further for you. Would you mind sending us a DM? Thanks - Kimmy
@CountessAu Hi there, thanks for reaching out. Would you mind sending us a DM with more info? We'd appreciate the chance to look into this further. Thanks - Jaya
@CosettePaneque Hi Cosette, thanks for reaching out. Would you mind sending us a DM please - we may be able to provide more details about your flight. - Jen

@elliskate8722 Hi Kate, sorry to hear that your flight has been cancelled. We know how inconvenient this can be and we try to avoid them as much as possible. Would you mind sending us a DM? We'd appreciate the chance to look into this further. Thanks - Kimmy

@TinaTvarthalis Hi Dutchess, we’re really sorry to hear about your experience and appreciate this has been a very frustrating situation for you. If you require assistance, we'd be happy to assist- just send us a DM to speak with an agent. Thanks - Jen
@Angie88403684 Hi Angie, sorry for any inconvenience caused. Should you require any further assistance, feel free to send us a DM to speak with an agent. Thanks - Vi
@akashbelani11 Hi Akash, sorry to hear your flight got cancelled. Would you mind sending us a DM with more info? We'll see what we can do to assist you. – Mauri
@Zachorrey Hi Zach, thanks for reaching out. Yes, boarding passes are issued once you check in to your flight. You may check this link https://t.co/oATd3rfenP for more info. Thanks - Jeff

urls.description: Save some time by checking online. Here's what you need to know about Jetstar's online check-in process, including instructions on how to get a boarding pass..

data.text: @SarahInSix Hi Sarah, we do our best to avoid delays – but sometimes things are out of our hands. Would you mind sending us a DM - we may be able to provide more details about your delayed flight. Thanks - Jeff
@MusicLoverLily Hi Lily, sorry to hear that your flight was impacted by disruptions. We’re so glad our team was on-hand to help with your flight. We’ll definitely pass on the feedback! Thanks – Jeff

@jadexleanne Hi Jade, I'm sorry to hear that your flight was delayed. We do our best to avoid delays – but sometimes things are out of our hands. If you need further assistance, please send us a DM with your booking reference and full name. Thanks – Jeff

@JohnSki67913314 Hi John, sorry to hear about what happened. we do our best to avoid delays – but sometimes things are out of our hands. If you require assistance with rebooking your flight/s or would like to explore alternative options, please send us a DM. Thanks - Kimmy

@grazierdave Hi David, sorry to hear this - we limit carry-on to 7kgs in total for each passenger including things like handbags and laptop bags. If you think you might need a little more next time you travel, you can purchase an extra 7kgs online before you fly. Thanks – Jaya

data.text: @LifeIsTheBeach Hi Frankie, sorry to hear your flight has been cancelled. Would you mind sending us a DM with your booking details? We’d appreciate the chance to look into this further. Thanks - Leslie

@ChevalierPierre Hi Pierra. Sorry to hear that your flight was cancelled, we know how inconvenient cancelled flights can be and we try to avoid them as much as possible. Would you mind sending us a DM with more info? We’d appreciate the chance to look into this further. Thanks - Dan
@Pandit07Pritam @Pandit07Pritam Hi, sorry to hear this. Thanks for letting us know so we can look into what happened here. - Jay
@DaraGar71649378 Hi Dara, sorry to hear this. Would you mind sending us a DM with more details? We'd appreciate the chance to look into this further. Thanks - Jay
@chromatist Hi @chromatist, thanks for reaching out. Would you mind sending us a DM with more info? We'd like to check this further. Thanks - Jeff
@benlorduk Hi Ben, I understand how frustrating this can be. Would you mind sending us a DM with more info? We'd like to look into this further. Thanks - Jeff

@benlorduk Hi Ben, I appreciate your upset. Your carry-on allowance is separate to your checked baggage allowance - which means there are still excess baggage fees if you go over the carry-on weight limit before you board your flight. Thanks - Dan

@SteveM_ac Hi Steve, I understand how upsetting it can be when you've made plans in advance and the flight got canceled. We’d like to get you on your way as soon as possible. Could you please DM us here to speak with an agent? Thanks - Jen

@faircracksport 1/2 Most of the time, flight times are only changed by a few minutes but in rare cases changes of 24 hours do occur. I recommend you keep an eye on our website(https://t.co/K7hQg5Bv0s) as we're constantly reviewing our schedules. Any updates will be posted there! Thanks - Jen

@faircracksport 1/1 Hi Paul, I appreciate that you'd like to book flight JQ 701. As of the moment, it's currently unavailable. Every airline makes adjustments to its schedule for seasons twice a year.

@Lapew64 Hi Tony, sorry to hear this was your experience. Paying extra fees on the day is never ideal. However, we limit carry-on to 7kgs in total for each passenger – including things like handbags and laptop bags. For more info, please click this link - https://t.co/dvkDaem7zx. - Kimmy

@EamonnLeighton Hi Eamonn. I understand it can be frustrating when your flight got changed - we do our best to avoid making changes to our schedules unless it’s absolutely necessary. If you require assistance, feel free to DM us here so we can discuss your options and assist. Thanks - Jen
